entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023
